query.mssql: create table {0} ([ReportSessionId] varchar(256) NOT NULL, [BusinessUnit] nvarchar(max) NULL, [Department] nvarchar(max) NULL, [ApprovalRule] nvarchar(max) NULL, [ApprovalRuleId] int NULL, [ApprovalRuleUrl] nvarchar(max) NULL, [ApprovalRulePriority] int NULL, [Status] nvarchar(max) NULL, [Category] nvarchar(max) NULL, [DocumentKind] nvarchar(max) NULL, [DocumentFlow] nvarchar(max) NULL, [DocumentParentType] nvarchar(max) NULL, [Relation] nvarchar(max) NULL)
query.postgres: create table {0} (ReportSessionId citext NOT NULL, BusinessUnit citext NULL, Department citext NULL, ApprovalRule citext NULL, ApprovalRuleId int NULL, ApprovalRuleUrl citext NULL, ApprovalRulePriority int NULL, Status citext NULL, Category citext NULL, DocumentKind citext NULL, DocumentFlow citext NULL, DocumentParentType citext NULL, Relation citext NULL)

query.mssql: select * from Sungero_Reports_ApprovalRulesConsolidated temp where ReportSessionId = @ReportSessionId order by businessUnit, department, documentFlow, documentKind, category, ApprovalRuleId ASC;
query.postgres: select * from Sungero_Reports_ApprovalRulesConsolidated temp where ReportSessionId = @ReportSessionId order by businessUnit, department, documentFlow, documentKind, category, ApprovalRuleId ASC;
